org.dita.dost.exception

Class DITAOTException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.dita.dost.exception.DITAOTException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class DITAOTException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception class for DITAOT, used to handle exceptions in Java modules.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
